title: Didn't got the capsule
body: I log in and rito informed me that i am honor level 3 and that i have some suprise to get a capsule but i don't have it

replies.body: Gratz for hitting Honor Rank 3! Those Honor Capsules aren't necessarily a guaranteed drop when you rank up, but they have a chance of dropping any time you would have normally received a key fragment.

Can I ask why I am only getting key fragments even though Im Honor 3?
I've had 3 sets of keys since hitting honor 3 and not any capsules.
